00001000000010000000001111111111 # move 16384 into register 0
00001010000000000000000000000000 # print r0
00000000000001000000000000000000 # add r0 and r0 and store in r0 + flags set
00001010000000000000000000000000 # print r0
00001100010010000000000000000100 # loop until carryover occurs
00010000000011000000000000010000 #ASR
00010011000011000000001111111111 #DIV
00010100000011000000000000000000 #AND
00010101000011000000000000000000 #LOR
00010110000011000000000000000000 #XOR
*
!
